caption.p: TFIIF gene expression and DNA methylation. a TFIIF gene expression. b Illustration of the region of CpG islands sites, which includes 9 CpG sites, DNA methylation patterns of the two groups (X and W) analyzed by BSP. Each line represents one individual bacterial clone, and each circle represents one single CpG dinucleotide. Open circles show unmethylated CpGs and black circles show methylated CpGs
